TopicTitle: hello quick presentation to responde for the 64bit thread

Articles.Content:
hello I'm French and I play KSP since 0.22, I'm a poor designer so Mods are a good alternative to play I feel much creative, but I have

a true respect and admiration (no for these people make thing in stock condition.

I have ÃƒÂ  background of modders with FS2002 and FS2009, this why I love people make mods...

and big thank for KSP team and modders.

My rig is a AlienWare M17Xr3 with GTX 560m and 6gb memory, with Windows 7 PRO 64 bit

in this condition vessel with more 600 parts well it's playable but laggy.

So when I see the thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82118-KSP-64bits-on-Windows-(this-time-it-s-not-a-request)

I was very happy try for test immediately , and there are no comparison between 32bit and 64bit with my PC it's faster at all level

and I have tested ksp in 4gb + but yes there a but !!!!!!

I'm really surprising by the level of people they have no bug in 64bit , ksp work perfect in stock mod without mods with scenario but

start a new save game and ..... thing append !

voilÃƒÂ  merci thk to KSP team and modders.

(I post a simple bug in the 64 bit thread, in stock condition and new save, to verify it's just for me or not)

bye
Welcome to the forums and I am glad you are enjoying it. There is a French Thread if you feel more comfortable talking and asking questions there.
Bienvenue! Je parle quelque Francais, et j'aime manger le bacon! J'ai un ordinateur portable, mais j'obtiendrai un ordinateur rapide pour Kerbal Space Program et et autres jeux. Bonsoir!
